page.title: 07HOUSING-PORTNAHAVEN
page.content: There is a predominance of old houses. Many of these were built before 1900 and some are well over a hundred years old.Recently the village was designated a conservation area,this brought many advantages eg.house owners were eligible for generous "home improvement" grants.This has meant a steady up-grading of many of the old properties. {HOUSE TYPES {Single Storey House....30 {Two storey House....50 {Farm Houses....2 {Croft Houses....3 {Unoccupied....3 { {Owner-occupied....35 {Owner-occupied(Holiday Homes)....26 {Rented Houses(all council owned)....11 {Remainder....UNKNOWN
